title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 815.12 - Staff and client relationships
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 815.12 - Staff and client relationships

State Regulations
(a) Sexual contact prohibited. All sexual contact between OASAS program staff and a
client is sexual abuse. (b) Sexual
contact includes inappropriate touching, indecent exposure, sexual assault, taking or distributing sexually explicit pictures, voyeurism or other sexual
exploitation. (c) A client is
incapable of consenting to sexual contact if they are admitted to a program
funded, certified or otherwise authorized by the Office. (d) All staff shall be trained, upon hire and
annually thereafter, on, and be provided with supervision about, maintaining
appropriate boundaries with clients. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
